title: My Portfolio
aboutMeDescription: I am a person passionate about programming, games and music.
role1Description: In this role I am responsible for develop solutions for a payments app, using Android (Java) and frameworks such as RxJava and Retrofit.
educationDescription: This degree addresses several areas, such as Development, Security and Management.
projectDescription1: This project was made thinking about how was dificult to track progress of the student aid of UFPB. So, I made a python script that goes to the source of the process and collect the data about it, and after that make them available through an API made in Flask. The API was deployed on Heroku.
projectDescription2: In here, I was collecting data about Covid-19 from Brazil's Ministry of Health and make them available through an Graphql API.
projectDescription3: This app was made in UFPB's project Apps4Society , and he aims to facilitate the literacy process, using images and sounds in the classic hangman game.
